function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Study documents how chronic disease and covid-19 are related to the built and natural environment, potentially indicating environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Authors express caution in drawing conclusions based on fixed parameter methods and highly aggregate spatial data, highlighting the potential for inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Authors express discomfort with using early, evolving covid-19 data at the county level, delaying the study’s publication multiple times to wait for more reliable data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking built environment and natural environment with chronic and infectious disease covid-19 pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obesity mediating the relationship between the built and natural environment and covid-19 mortality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in built environment relationships with obesity and covid-19 across income and ethnicity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Compact development and densification bringing people together","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on private vehicles and low support for public transit","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compact transit-oriented development","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Densification of communities leading to higher population density","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obesity and old age correlated with greater covid-19 mortality risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased obesity rates in the united states and globally","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of active travel supportive infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate results and inferences due to unobserved heterogeneity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent impact of obesity and built environment on covid-19 mortality in different countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of construction material supply","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obstruction of construction due to movement restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job loss due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economy hit by 3-6% gdp","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced mobility causing industries to shut down","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on supply chain and construction industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of exclusive study on the impact of covid-19 on the construction industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting exploratory interviews with construction experts without proper protective measures may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using questionnaire surveys without proper safeguards can result in the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data analysis involving physical interaction and close collaboration may pose a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using random sampling technique for data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of sample size based on unlimited population","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic causing suspension of construction projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers and technical engineers working with full consciousness and scrutiny","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Off-site workers and project participants required to maintain constant communication and coordination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Modification of construction management to accommodate sudden crises","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of projects due to contagious virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time overrun due to pandemic control period","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact due to economic deterioration and project suspensions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious virus in construction sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuation of material price and shortage of materials and supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of workers in urgent medical facility projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and conspiracy theories about the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misconception that climate change is a distant threat and less urgent than immediate crises.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underemphasis of the impacts of climate change on public health in public debates.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased deaths in developing countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term acceptance of lockdown measures due to temporary nature","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of climate change as a crisis with temporary solutions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global nature of climate change and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in national responses to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pandemic measures for climate change response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to raised indoor temperature and humidity can result in severe sick building syndrome sbs symptoms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants causing annual loss of disability-adjusted life years dalys and economic losses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
